headline: Jim Cramer on Phillips 66: “This is The Right Time to Buy the Stock”
summary: Phillips 66 (NYSE:PSX) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. During the lightning round of the episode, a caller inquired about the stock, and Cramer commented: “Well, you know what? This is the right time. Mark Lashier runs the company.
